actions.text: Committee on Commerce ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Commerce reported an original measure. With written report No. 97-42.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 53.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 to extend authorization for appropriations for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 to extend, through fiscal year 1982, the authorization of appropriations to the President, the United States Geological Survey, the National Science Foundation, and the National Bureau of Standards to carry out the purposes of such Act.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 to extend authorization for appropriations for fiscal year 1982, and for other purposes.
